short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize YouTube videos/playlists or any web page/link, and organize your summaries by topic to learn anything faster

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
• Summarize YouTube Videos: Too lazy to watch an entire video, or simply just want to make sure a video is worth it before devoting your time to it? Summarize any YouTube video

• Summarize Entire YouTube Playlists: Want to learn everything in an educational playlist, or have a bunch of videos saved for later? Summarize every video simultaneously with the click of a button.

• Summarize Any Page: Get key insights of an article, blog, or any page text content in seconds. 

• Summarize Any Link: Right-click to summarize any link in the background.

• Saved Summaries: Every summary is saved to your account so that you can review them later. Organize your summaries by categories and channel.

• Smart Tagging: Have AI automatically tag your videos/summaries by category.
